attributes.action: progressively grant cost of living increases to all pensioners living abroad
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is totally unjust that British pensioners living in Canada, South Africa, Australia & New Zealand are denied cost of living increases, whereas those in "more foreign" countries receive the increases. The split is about 40% / 60% - so very significant.
If necessary, introduce parity gradually over a number of years.
